actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Canaveral National Seashore in the State of Florida, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Canaveral National Seashore in the State of Florida. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Canaveral National Seashore in the State of Florida, and for other purposes.
